result.longName: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, manufactures, markets, and distributes consumer goods in Thailand, the Philippines, and internationally. The company operates through Skincare Business and Beauty Products Business segments. It offers skincare, cleansing, and sunscreen and make up products under the NAMU LIFE SNAILWHITE trademark; acne treatment and care, cleaning, facial skin care, and sunscreen products under the OXE'CURE brand; skincare, sunscreen, cleansing, and lip care products under the SoS trademark; and toothpaste, toothbrush, whitening, and other oral care products under the SPARKLE brand. The company also provides hair dryers, hot air stylers, hair crimpers, hair curlers, power brushes, and accessories, as well as hair equipment for men under the LESASHA brand; small fitness equipment, gloves, and support equipment under the JASON brand; garment steamers and small home appliances under the AT HOME brand; hair removal products for women under the EMJOI brand; beauty products under the Kuron brand; and cooking appliances under the BEAR brand. In addition, it offers management, technical, financial, and enterprise services; training and sales advice services; business consultation services related to skin products; and general wholesale trade services. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
